articles.title: Rare 60,000-year-old axe found by 9-year-old boy - Earth.com
articles.description: A 6-year-old’s beach find turns out to be a 60,000-year-old Neanderthal hand axe, now displayed in Worthing Museum.
articles.content: When Ben was just six years old, he noticed a shiny rock while playing on Shoreham Beach in West Sussex. It looked distinct from the countless other stones and pebbles that usually filled his pockets… [+5299 chars]
